custom_css: .banner-msg2 h1,.banner-msg2 h2,h4 {font-weight: bolder; line-height: 1.5; text-align: center; width: auto; margin: 0 auto; padding: 0; color: #fff; display: flex; align-items: center; justify-content: center;}

.banner-msg2 {z-index: 1.5; height: auto; position: relative; top: 0; right: 0; left: 10%; width: 90%; margin: 0; background: linear-gradient( 90deg, rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.75), 20%, rgba(62, 84, 168, 1), rgba(247, 34, 36, 0.75) 90% );}
